data.message:
Yo #Eminem , or should I call you Slim shady? Why you got your fist ✊in the air ? When You whiter than Greg Brady?

I see you're trying to be relevant again 
but your career is celibate my friend. 

Go back to 8 mile, 
Your rhymes are way outta style. 
Obsolete and outdated,  like The forty year old Virgin screaming at Trump like you're sexually frustrated...

Is that why your palms are Sweaty? 
Beatin your wood to Obama pics like the plank from Ed , Edd And Eddy? 

I mean, Who TF fuck does this guy think he really is? 

Playing "gangsta" in your freestyle with your all-black-friends...
Screaming Black lives matter with your all-white-kids. 

You're an imposter.. I've had enough, 
Just because you finally grew your little beard all of a sudden you think you're tough? 🤔

No I'm not a rapper but I sh*t on libtards like you daily. 
You ain't nothin but a B*itch, should've changed your name to Hailie.
Oops... Ain't that your daughter?. 
She'll  be calling me daddy,
after I wreck her b,b,b,b*tch a$$ father. Mic drop 🎤🎵
🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥
